attributes.action: The Immediate Resignation & Expulsion of Gregory Campbell MP.
attributes.additional_details:
Gregory Campbell MP, yet again demonstrates he is unfit to represent the entirety of his constituents with Sectarian, Racist, Xenophobic remarks time after time.

"Just watched BBC Songs of Praise which this week was Gospel Singer of the year semi final. This I'm afraid was BBC at it's BLM worst. There were 5 singers, all of them black. There were 3 judges all of them black and one presenter who incidentally was, yes black..."

The latest in bigotry from one Gregory Campbell.
attributes.background: The Immediate Resignation & Expulsion of Gregory Campbell MP for recent remarks made online during the BBC Songs of Praise programme.
